categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Madrix Hansor, leader of Hansor's Hooligans, was a male who lived during the Galactic Civil War. Hansor was previously a member of the Imperial Army. While fighting Rebel forces in the Dalcretti system, the unit was cut off. During the battle, a platoon led by Demelza Mintori either was unable to or refused to help Hansor's platoon. As a result, Hansor swore personal vengeance.

Hansor's grudge against Mintori spilled over to when the pair led gladiator walker teams in the Core Gladiator Walker League. Hansor faced off against a member of the Destructors, Jandri Garn, in the 12th Solassi Interzonals Challenge Match but both suffered enough damage to their vehicles to be eliminated from the competition.

Two years later, Hansor led the Hooligans to the Destructors home city, Sedratis City and took up residence in the Sedratis Coliseum. Hansor issues a challenge to the Destructors to evict him if they could.
